title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, the perfect addition to your home! With its sleek black design and impressive features, this humidifier is a must-have for any buyer.

The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier boasts a generous tank capacity of 1 gallon, ensuring that you can enjoy the benefits of a cool mist for longer periods without constantly refilling. The low tank indicator feature lets you know when it's time for a refill, so you never have to worry about running out of moisture in the air.

Cleaning up is a breeze with the dishwasher safe feature. Simply remove the components and let your dishwasher do the work, saving you time and effort. 

With a humidity capacity of 142ml per hour, this humidifier creates the perfect environment for your home, helping to relieve dryness and improve the air quality. 

Enhance your experience with the aroma tray, allowing you to add your favorite scents and create a soothing atmosphere. 

Choose from three different speeds to customize your comfort level. The mechanical knob control makes it easy to adjust the settings to your liking.

Covering an impressive 320 sq. ft. area, this humidifier is suitable for bedrooms, living rooms, or even offices. 

Despite its powerful performance, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is lightweight, weighing only 6.33 lbs, making it easy to move and transport as needed.

For added convenience, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is compatible with the BestAir H62 replacement filter, ensuring that you always have access to fresh, clean air.

Safety is a top priority, which is why this humidifier includes empty tank protection. You can rest easy knowing that the humidifier will automatically shut off when the tank is empty, preventing any potential hazards.

Experience the benefits of a cool mist humidifier with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Don't miss out on this opportunity to create a comfortable and healthy living space. Get yours today!

Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, the perfect addition to your home for a comfortable and healthy living environment. With its sleek black design, this 1-gallon humidifier not only enhances the ambiance of any room, but also provides a range of incredible features.

Say goodbye to dry air with the cool mist evaporative technology, which releases a refreshing mist to moisturize the air and alleviate dryness. The low tank indicator ensures that you never run out of water unexpectedly, allowing for continuous operation and peace of mind.

Cleaning up is a breeze with the dishwasher-safe feature, making maintenance effortless and convenient. The 142ml/h humidity capacity ensures optimal moisture levels, creating a soothing atmosphere that promotes relaxation and well-being.

Enhance your surroundings with the built-in aroma tray, allowing you to fill the air with your favorite scents and transform your space into a tranquil oasis. Choose from 3 different speed settings to customize the mist output based on your preferences.

Controlling the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is a breeze with the mechanical knob, giving you full control over the mist intensity and ensuring a comfortable environment at all times. With a coverage area of 320 sq. ft., this humidifier is perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, and offices.

Weighing only 6.33 lbs, this lightweight and portable humidifier can be easily moved around your home to provide relief wherever you need it most. Additionally, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is compatible with the BestAir H62 replacement filter, ensuring long-lasting performance and efficient operation.

Experience the benefits of optimal humidity levels and create a healthier and more comfortable living space with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Don't miss out on this must-have home essential. Get yours today and start enjoying the benefits of a well-humidified environment.
